review: Awesome! I have one on every TV. My kids each wanted one, so they were stocking stuffers. We have taken one with use on vacation a couple times now. Great to have your setup already to play like at home. On downside is that you are at the mercy of the speed of wifi at your hotel. You don't need much, but one place was very poor.
